name: Monica Salmon
welcome: Monica Salmón is a best-selling author known for her fearless and deeply personal approach to writing. She tackles themes such as breast cancer, eroticism, and unconventional pathologies—topics many tend to avoid, but which she confronts head-on. With honesty, sensuality, and emotional clarity, her stories engage readers in raw, intimate, and necessary explorations. She writes about what others keep silent, transforming shame into power and pain into narratives that resonate long after the final page.
aboutMe: Clinical Psychologist, Bestselling Author, and Columnist.
